com.paypal.selion.configuration

Class ConfigManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.configuration.ConfigManager

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class ConfigManager
extends Object
    This class supports configuration operations on SeLion local configurations LocalConfig being used in TestNG suites. This supports configurations when running with parallel suites (i.e. TestNG parallel = {tests, methods, classes, instances}) by supporting distinct local configurations for each TestNG xmltest. When reading config values without parallel execution (parallel=false) values are effectively same as the value provided by Config To get access to the SeLion local configuration values for the currently executing <test>. 
     @Test
 public void f(ITestContext ctx) {
     String name = ctx.getCurrentXmlTest().getName();
     LocalConfig config = ConfigManager.getConfig(name);
     String Value = config.getConfigProperty(ConfigProperty.HOSTNAME);
 }
    If the current <test> name can not be determined, then defaults to the global configuration that is available via Config.getConfigProperty(com.paypal.selion.configuration.Config.ConfigProperty)/ Config.setConfigProperty(com.paypal.selion.configuration.Config.ConfigProperty, String).

    • Method Detail

      • addConfig

        public static void addConfig(String name,
             LocalConfig config)
        Adds the local configuration LocalConfig associated with name. Over-rides any config with the same name.
        Parameters:
        config - The LocalConfig.
        name - The name to associate with local config.

      • getConfig

        public static LocalConfig getConfig(String name)
        Returns the local configuration LocalConfig associated the provided name. If no config with that name has been added an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. 
         
 Use this method for reading any "test-specific" configuration at any listener invocation.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to search for.
        Returns:
        - A LocalConfig object that either represent's the configuration object that maps to the name given (or) a default Configuration object that apes the global configuration.

      • removeConfig

        public static boolean removeConfig(String name)
        Remove the local configuration LocalConfig associated supplied name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to remove
        Returns:
        - true if the configuration was successfully removed.

      • printConfiguration

        public static void printConfiguration(String testName)
        A utility method that can dump the configuration for a given <test> identified with its name.
        Parameters:
        testName - - The name of the test as given in the suite xml file.

      • isTestConfigPresent

        public static boolean isTestConfigPresent(String testName)
